body: Thanks you for suggestion, @kzm4269 . I found that it is more complicated and subtle than I expected when `name_scope` intertwines with `variable_scope`. As far as I see now, the behavior (create a new name_scope when variable_scope is opened) is on purpose by tensorflow, see #6189. I cannot believe it...
